sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding of the radioactive charcteristics of vertebral eosinophilic granuloma.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了提高對脊椎骨嗜酸性肉芽腫的認識。

sentences.english: The team found that the key appears to be joints in the bony vertebrae that wrap protectively around the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊發現起關鍵作用的是包圍脊索的脊椎骨關節。

sentences.english: She also writhes around in the shower with her vertebrae popping out of her back.
sentences.chinese: 她也繞着淋浴下痛苦地扭動蹦出後背的脊椎骨。

sentences.english: Keeping the spine flexible is the key to maintaining a youthful body.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎骨的柔軟度越高，越能保持身體年輕。

sentences.english: Congenital vertebral anomalies include alterations of the shape and number of vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 先天性脊柱畸形包括各種脊椎骨的變形。

sentences.english: Smiling, I flow into his veins, and his spine.
sentences.chinese: 微笑着，我流入他的靜脈，和脊椎骨。

sentences.english: Good posture contributes to the health of your spine.
sentences.chinese: 好的體態關係到你脊椎骨的健康。

sentences.english: Never grow a wishbone, daughter, where your backbone ought to be.
sentences.chinese: 女兒，永勿在你應置脊椎骨的地方長如願骨。

sentences.english: Uneven growth patterns in the vertebrae indicate malnourishment as a child.
sentences.chinese: 脊椎骨不均勻生長顯示兒時營養不良。

sentences.english: The bullet became lodged in her spine.
sentences.chinese: 那顆子彈嵌在她的脊椎骨裏。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
